name: Quick Draw
description:
Prove you have the fastest hands in the West with this high-speed virtual reality game. Practice your skills, challenge your friends, and prove your worth as the Sheriff of town by defending it from ruffians. This is a virtual reality experience that challenges a player's reaction time. You must control the urge to draw until you hear the signal. The round is over when only one is left standing.

  • Four intense game modes: Defend the Town Mode, Time Trials, Blind Time Trials, and Online Duels.
  • Take on your opponents in high-speed, face to face shootouts!
  • The bullets are real physics objects. You can hit your target with a ricochet and even shoot a bullet out of the sky!
  • Compare your reaction times via leaderboards and prove you are the best of the best.
  • Challenge other players in real-time online duels!
  • Designed and built for VR: Play on both the HTC Vive AND the Oculus Rift with Touch!
